meta_description: GitHub Pages-based portfolio template for tech-savvy Product Managers and Engineers
meta_keywords: portfolio, portfolio template, portfolio for engineers
pitch: Decade of Product & Technical Innovation | Start-up Growth | Cloud & AI Expert | IIoT | Industry 4.0

About.section_data: Over ten years of experience in the IT industry with specialization and expertise in machine learning, deep learning, and data engineering. Designed and delivered scalable ML production systems end-to-end with advanced data lifecycle practices. Adept in CNNs, RNNs, GANs, NLP, anomaly detection, and predictive modeling. Built real-time telemetry and vision-based AI solutions across sectors like manufacturing, healthcare, and finance. Architected and deployed systems on AWS, IBM, and Azure clouds, leveraging modern big data tools.

projects.section_explanatory_text: Highlighted projects showcasing my expertise across AI, ML, and data platforms:

section_data.name: Vision IQ
section_data.description: An AI-powered vision platform to automate quality inspection and proactively alert on machining parameters impacting product quality. Integrated ML pipelines for barcode recognition, fault prediction, and production analytics.

section_data.name: Barcode Image Analyzer
section_data.description: Automated barcode recognition using drone-captured images with deep CNN models. Achieved 75% accuracy and significant performance boost in warehouse automation.

section_data.name: Gazelle
section_data.description: Built data pipelines and analytics for industrial IoT platforms including time series modeling, circuit fault prediction, and self-service dashboards. Implemented Kafka, HBase, Impala on cloud infrastructure.

section_data.name: Realized Price Prediction
section_data.description: Correlated social sentiment with stock prices using NLP and machine learning. Built predictive models based on real-time news and social feeds.

section_data.name: IT Monitoring & Resume Clustering
section_data.description: NLP-driven platform to analyze email sentiments, skill patterns, and resume relevance ranking for IT performance management and hiring.
